alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gallia and northwestern Mason Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gallipolis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Henderson, Leon, Adamsville, Gallopolis Ferry and Southside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
